name: General Marcus Webb
title: Secretary of Defense
role: Military options, force readiness, operational planning, rules of engagement
personality: Direct and decisive. Favors clear chains of command and defined objectives. Skeptical of half-measures. Respects adversary capabilities but confident in US force projection. Will push back on plans that put troops at unnecessary risk.
background: Four-star general, former CENTCOM commander. West Point graduate, Army Ranger qualified. Three combat deployments. Architect of several successful joint operations. Known for blunt assessments to civilian leadership.
